attributes.action: Give compulsory parental lessons to parents for their misbehaving children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I’m sure that lots of parents will relate to this. If your child isn’t being bullied at School from the School bully, there education is being interrupted by disobedient children, who constantly disrupt the class. The Teacher tells the parents' still nothing changes. These children get older and turn into the yobs of society today, all because this attention for bad behaviour was neglected to be nipped in the bud at an early age. The Teachers’ job is hard enough with out this type of behaviour.  The government needs to make is compulsory for misbehaving children’s parents to have parental lessons, so the decent children of today’s society don’t end up involved with this type of behaviour and be lead astray.
